message:
Convert Xiaolai font from TTF to WOFF2 for better compression

Changes:
- Converted Xiaolai-Regular.ttf (21 MB) to Xiaolai-Regular.woff2 (11 MB)
- Updated App.css to reference .woff2 format
- Updated index.html preload to use .woff2
- 48% size reduction, but still need nginx caching for optimal performance

Note: Font still too large (11 MB), but caching will prevent re-downloads
